{IERC721-approve}."},"approveSiring(address,uint256)":{"params":{"_addr":"The address that will be able to sire with your Hauntoo. Set to  address(0) to clear all siring approvals for this Hauntoo.","_sireId":"A Hauntoo that you own that _addr will now be able to sire with."}},"balanceOf(address)":{"details":"See {IERC721-balanceOf}."},"bidOnSiringAuction(uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Completes a siring auction by bidding.  Immediately breeds the winning matron with the sire on auction.","params":{"_matronId":"- ID of the matron owned by the bidder.","_sireId":"- ID of the sire on auction."}},"breedWithAuto(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_matronId":"The ID of the Hauntoo acting as matron (will end up pregnant if successful)","_sireId":"The ID of the Hauntoo acting as sire (will begin its siring cooldown if successful)"}},"canBreedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"params":{"_matronId":"The ID of the proposed matron.","_sireId":"The ID of the proposed sire."}},"createGen0Auction(uint256)":{"details":"Creates a new gen0 hauntoo with the given genes and  creates an auction for it."},"createPromoHauntoo(uint256,address)":{"details":"we can create promo babys, up to a limit. Only callable by owner","params":{"_genes":"the encoded genes of the baby to be created, any value is accepted","_owner":"the future owner of the created babys. Default to contract owner"}},"createSaleAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Put a hauntoo up for auction.  Does some ownership trickery to create auctions in one tx."},"createSiringAuction(uint256,uint256,uint256,uint256)":{"details":"Put a hauntoo up for auction to be sire.  Performs checks to ensure the hauntoo can be sired, then  delegates to reverse auction."},"getApproved(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-getApproved}."},"giveBirth(uint256)":{"details":"Looks at a given Hauntoo and, if pregnant and if the gestation period has passed,  combines the genes of the two parents to create a new baby. The new Hauntoo is assigned  to the current owner of the matron. Upon successful completion, both the matron and the  new baby will be ready to breed again. Note that anyone can call this function (if they  are willing to pay the gas!), but the new baby always goes to the mother's owner.","params":{"_matronId":"A Hauntoo ready to give birth."},"returns":{"_0":"The Hauntoo ID of the new baby."}},"isApprovedForAll(address,address)":{"details":"See {IERC721-isApprovedForAll}."},"isPregnant(uint256)":{"details":"Checks whether a hauntoo is currently pregnant.","params":{"_hauntooId":"reference the id of the baby, any user can inquire about it"}},"isReadyToBreed(uint256)":{"params":{"_hauntooId":"reference the id of the baby, any user can inquire about it"}},"name()":{"details":"See {IERC721Metadata-name}."},"owner()":{"details":"Returns the address of the current owner."},"ownerOf(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-ownerOf}."},"paused()":{"details":"Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise."},"renounceOwnership()":{"details":"Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-safeTransferFrom}."},"safeTransferFrom(address,address,uint256,bytes)":{"details":"See {IERC721-safeTransferFrom}."},"setApprovalForAll(address,bool)":{"details":"See {IERC721-setApprovalForAll}."},"setAutoBirthFee(uint256)":{"details":"Updates the minimum payment required for calling giveBirthAuto(). Can only  be called by the COO address. (This fee is used to offset the gas cost incurred  by the autobirth daemon)."},"setGeneScienceAddress(address)":{"details":"Update the address of the genetic contract, can only be called by the CEO.","params":{"_address":"An address of a GeneScience contract instance to be used from this point forward."}},"setSaleAuctionAddress(address)":{"details":"Sets the reference to the sale auction.","params":{"_address":"- Address of sale contract."}},"setSiringAuctionAddress(address)":{"details":"Sets the reference to the siring auction.","params":{"_address":"- Address of siring contract."}},"supportsInterface(bytes4)":{"details":"See {IERC165-supportsInterface}."},"symbol()":{"details":"See {IERC721Metadata-symbol}."},"tokenByIndex(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721Enumerable-tokenByIndex}."},"tokenOfOwnerByIndex(address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721Enumerable-tokenOfOwnerByIndex}."},"tokenURI(uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721Metadata-tokenURI}."},"totalSupply()":{"details":"See {IERC721Enumerable-totalSupply}."},"transferFrom(address,address,uint256)":{"details":"See {IERC721-transferFrom}."},"transferOwnership(address)":{"details":"Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner."},"withdrawAuctionBalances()":{"details":"Transfers the balance of the sale auction contract to the HauntooCore contract. We use two-step withdrawal to prevent two transfer calls in the auction bid function."}},"title":"all functions related to creating babys","version":1},"userdoc":{"kind":"user","methods":{"approveSiring(address,uint256)":{"notice":"Grants approval to another user to sire with one of your Hauntoos."},"autoBirthFee()":{"notice":"The minimum payment required to use breedWithAuto(). This fee goes towards  the gas cost paid by whatever calls giveBirth(), and can be dynamically updated by  the COO role as the gas price changes."},"breedWithAuto(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Breed a Hauntoo you own (as matron) with a sire that you own, or for which you  have previously been given Siring approval. Will either make your cat pregnant, or will  fail entirely. Requires a pre-payment of the fee given out to the first caller of giveBirth()"},"canBreedWith(uint256,uint256)":{"notice":"Checks to see if two cats can breed together, including checks for  ownership and siring approvals. Does NOT check that both cats are ready for  breeding (i.e. breedWith could still fail until the cooldowns are finished).  TODO: Shouldn't this check pregnancy and cooldowns?!?"},"giveBirth(uint256)":{"notice":"Have a pregnant Hauntoo give birth!"},"isReadyToBreed(uint256)":{"notice":"Checks that a given baby is able to breed (i.e. it is not pregnant or  in the middle of a siring documentation.text: @title all functions related to creating babys

@dev Creates a new gen0 hauntoo with the given genes and
  creates an auction for it.

@dev Computes the next gen0 auction starting price, given
  the average of the past 5 prices + 50%.
@title all functions related to creating babys

@dev Creates a new gen0 hauntoo with the given genes and
  creates an auction for it.

@dev Computes the next gen0 auction starting price, given
  the average of the past 5 prices + 50%.

params._addr: The address that will be able to sire with your Hauntoo. Set to  address(0) to clear all siring approvals for this Hauntoo.
params._sireId: A Hauntoo that you own that _addr will now be able to sire with.

bidOnSiringAuction(uint256,uint256).details: Completes a siring auction by bidding.  Immediately breeds the winning matron with the sire on auction.

params._matronId: - ID of the matron owned by the bidder.
params._sireId: - ID of the sire on auction.

params._matronId: The ID of the Hauntoo acting as matron (will end up pregnant if successful)
params._sireId: The ID of the Hauntoo acting as sire (will begin its siring cooldown if successful)

params._matronId: The ID of the proposed matron.
params._sireId: The ID of the proposed sire.

createGen0Auction(uint256).details: Creates a new gen0 hauntoo with the given genes and  creates an auction for it.

createPromoHauntoo(uint256,address).details: we can create promo babys, up to a limit. Only callable by owner

params._genes: the encoded genes of the baby to be created, any value is accepted
params._owner: the future owner of the created babys. Default to contract owner

createSaleAuction(uint256,uint256,uint25.details: Put a hauntoo up for auction.  Does some ownership trickery to create auctions in one tx.

createSiringAuction(uint256,uint256,uint.details: Put a hauntoo up for auction to be sire.  Performs checks to ensure the hauntoo can be sired, then  delegates to reverse auction.

giveBirth(uint256).details: Looks at a given Hauntoo and, if pregnant and if the gestation period has passed,  combines the genes of the two parents to create a new baby. The new Hauntoo is assigned  to the current owner of the matron. Upon successful completion, both the matron and the  new baby will be ready to breed again. Note that anyone can call this function (if they  are willing to pay the gas!), but the new baby always goes to the mother's owner.

params._matronId: A Hauntoo ready to give birth.

returns._0: The Hauntoo ID of the new baby.

isPregnant(uint256).details: Checks whether a hauntoo is currently pregnant.

params._hauntooId: reference the id of the baby, any user can inquire about it
reference the id of the baby, any user can inquire about it

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setAutoBirthFee(uint256).details: Updates the minimum payment required for calling giveBirthAuto(). Can only  be called by the COO address. (This fee is used to offset the gas cost incurred  by the autobirth daemon).

setGeneScienceAddress(address).details: Update the address of the genetic contract, can only be called by the CEO.

params._address: An address of a GeneScience contract instance to be used from this point forward.

setSaleAuctionAddress(address).details: Sets the reference to the sale auction.

setSiringAuctionAddress(address).details: Sets the reference to the siring auction.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

withdrawAuctionBalances().details: Transfers the balance of the sale auction contract to the HauntooCore contract. We use two-step withdrawal to prevent two transfer calls in the auction bid function.

devdoc.title: all functions related to creating babys

approveSiring(address,uint256).notice: Grants approval to another user to sire with one of your Hauntoos.

autoBirthFee().notice: The minimum payment required to use breedWithAuto(). This fee goes towards  the gas cost paid by whatever calls giveBirth(), and can be dynamically updated by  the COO role as the gas price changes.

breedWithAuto(uint256,uint256).notice: Breed a Hauntoo you own (as matron) with a sire that you own, or for which you  have previously been given Siring approval. Will either make your cat pregnant, or will  fail entirely. Requires a pre-payment of the fee given out to the first caller of giveBirth()

canBreedWith(uint256,uint256).notice: Checks to see if two cats can breed together, including checks for  ownership and siring approvals. Does NOT check that both cats are ready for  breeding (i.e. breedWith could still fail until the cooldowns are finished).  TODO: Shouldn't this check pregnancy and cooldowns?!?

giveBirth(uint256).notice: Have a pregnant Hauntoo give birth!

isReadyToBreed(uint256).notice: Checks that a given baby is able to breed (i.e. it is not pregnant or  in the middle of a siring cooldown).
